text: Edwin "Ted" Hunt (born 23 March 1920) is a retired British waterman. Born in London, he was a sapper waterman in World War II, and was in 1978 appointed as the Queen's Bargemaster. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Edwin Hunt â€“ D-Day & Life on the Thames" *Interview, December 2013. title: Edwin Hunt
